pageProduct.name: Oli6 Stage 2 Dairy Goat Milk Formula Follow On 800g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Stage 2 - From 6 months to 12 months - It is designed to complement the introduction of foods into your baby's diet
800gm

Introducing Oli6. One of the leading brands in goat milk infant formula nutrition. Specifically designed to aid digestion, immunity and brain development. Suitable for children with allergies, sensitivities, tummy issues and lactose intolerance.
Oli6 Follow On Formula is a premium dairy goat milk-based formula that is nutritionally tailored with a balance of key ingredients for formula fed babies aged 6 to 12 months. Made from Dairy Goat Milk
Manufactured in Australia, adhering to the strict Australian regulatory guideline. Oli6 is the only brand with a unique blend of 6 beneficial prebiotics, probiotics, oligos and vitamins to aid digestion, immunity and brain development for sensitive tummies.

Suitable For: Infants 6-12 months

Product Claims: Oli6 is the only brand with a unique blend of 6 beneficial prebiotics, probiotics, oligos and vitamins to aid digestion, immunity and brain development.

Boxed Contents: Powder

Size: 800g

Flavour: Natural

KEY FEATURES

• The natural prebiotics found in goat's milk promote good bacteria and reduce the incidence of bad bacteria aiding digestion.
• There are up to 6 times the amount of prebiotic oligos in goat's milk when compared to standard cow's milk
• Goat milk is considered the closest alternative to human breast milk as it has 5 of the same
• Oli 6 contains a natural probiotic BB536 which is scientifically proven to inhibit the growth of harmful bacteria.?This natural probiotic suppresses inflammatory responses and enhances intestinal barrier function.
• Oli6 contains Human milk oligosacchirides (HMO's) in Stage 2
• Prebiotic oligosacchirides to aid digestion
• Vitamins A and D to aid immunity
• Zinc and Vitamin C to aid brain development and cognitive function

Warnings

Follow On Formula suitable for infants from 6 months of age. This product should not be used for infants under 6 months of age. It is recommended that infants from the age of 6 months should be offered foods in addition to the infant formula product.
Important Notice - Breast milk is best for babies. Before you decide to use this product consult your doctor or health worker for advice.
Warning - follow instructions exactly. Prepare bottles and teats as directed. Do not change proportions or concentrate except on medical advice. Incorrect preparation can make your baby very ill.

Ingredients

Lactose, goat milk solids (full cream milk powder, whey protein powder), vegetable oils (including soybean), DHA powder, ARA powder, minerals (calcium carbonate, sodium citrate, ferric pyrophosphate, sodium selenite, zinc oxide, copper gluconate, manganese sulphate, potassium iodide), oligosaccharides (2'-O-fucosyllactose, lacto-N-neotetraose), choline bitartrate, vitamins (C, E, A, D3, B5, B3, K1, B2, B1, B12, B6, B9, B7), L-methionine, Bifidobacterium longum (BB536), taurine, inositol, L-carnitine, lutein.

Allergen Contains: Milk| Soybean

Directions

Use only the scoop provided for measurement of the Follow On formula. Scoop contains approximately 7.3 gram Use potable, previously boiled water that has cooled to lukewarm (body temperature approximately 37oC) for reconstitution. Measure the required amount of water into the feeding bottle. Add the appropriate number of level scoops. Shake gently to dissolve the powder.
Any formula left in the bottle after a feed must be discarded.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Before preparing the Follow On formula, wash your hands thoroughly. Ensure all utensils are clean. Each bottle should be prepared individually.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

If the bottle is to be stored prior to use it must be kept refrigerated and used within 24 hours.

Storage Temperature: Cool, dry conditions away from direct heat sources.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recyclable tin, lid and scoop

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
